questions.question_text:
A project manager has noticed that the performance of a new team member has increased dramatically over the past few months. The project manager has been measuring this team member's performance through the cost performance index (CPI) and schedule performance index (SPI) of work packages. The project manager has also assigned new, unrelated work packages to this team member. The project manager wants to formally record the team member's success in the project documentation.

What should the project manager do?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Send a communication to management recognizing the team member's contributions.
=> The key is the word "formally" record:
This option ensures that the recognition is formalized and communicated to higher management, which can have several benefits:

Visibility
Motivation
Documentation
While options B, C, and D may contribute to internal project documentation, they do not provide the same level of formal recognition and visibility as option A, which directly engages management.

Selected Answer: A
A. Send a communication to management recognizing the team member's contributions

Selected Answer: D
The answer is D. The question isn't asking about how you would praise or recognize the employee, it's asking about how you would record the performance.

D, very tricky

Formal method, is to recognize the team member in a project newsletter or team communication means 
So under project resource management plan , this question can be answered as D. 
The question says formally record- I think a newsletter will formally record it in the project issue log

Reconnaissance officielle : En envoyant une communication à la direction, le chef de projet peut officiellement reconnaître et valoriser les contributions du membre de l’équipe. Cela peut également ouvrir des opportunités pour des récompenses ou des promotions.
Motivation : Cette reconnaissance peut motiver non seulement le membre de l’équipe concerné, mais aussi les autres membres de l’équipe, en montrant que leurs efforts peuvent être reconnus au plus haut niveau.

A is correct.

questions.question_text:
A solution designer in an agile team often passes the design information to team members without any documentation. This has resulted in misunderstandings within the team.
What should the agile leader do?

discussion.content: I would go with A. Before going to HR try to enforce a good working environment. so that team members would know they can rely on each other.

Selected Answer: A
Before reaching out to HR, the PM should look at what he/she can do. Promoting a culture of empathy would be beneficial to the team.

Selected Answer: A
A. Help all team members learn to deal with their emotions by building a culture of empathy.

This option promotes a supportive team environment, encouraging understanding and compassion among team members. By fostering a culture of empathy, the project manager can help the team navigate the challenges posed by personal issues, ultimately improving overall team dynamics and performance.

Supporting emotional well-being can lead to better communication, collaboration, and resilience within the team, allowing them to work through difficulties together. Additionally, this approach can create a safe space for the affected team member to seek help and express their feelings, which can be beneficial for their recovery and reintegration into the team.

Selected Answer: A
A. Help all team members learn to deal with their emotions by building a culture of empathy
Go A for this

Selected Answer: A
I think it's A here. Going to HR is almost never the answer.

Selected Answer: D
HR can offer resources such as counseling services, employee assistance programs, or other forms of support to help the key team member manage their personal issues and improve their performance. Involving HR also ensures that the approach to addressing the situation is sensitive, confidential, and professionally handled.
answer is A

questions.question_text:
A key team member has recently gone through some personal issues that has affected their performance. The project manager noticed that the team member's emotional situation has affected the rest of the team's performance.

How should the project manager handle this situation?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Determine whether other cross-functional team members are able to take over the work

C is the best option as it focuses on utilizing the existing team’s capabilities, ensuring that work continues efficiently while minimizing delays in the iteration.

Selected Answer: C
C. Determine whether other cross-functional team members are able to take over the work

Selected Answer: C
That is why a cross functional team is good for projects .part of the advantages of cross functional teams is to breakdown silos to foster collaboration and better communication. I guess someone on the team would have an idea and carry on the work but the event should be recorded in the log

questions.question_text: A developer who has almost completed a required product feature for a prototype leaves the company in the middle of an iteration. What should the project manager do?

choices.A: Go to management and ask to hire a new external developer.
choices.B: Review the backlog to reschedule the deliverable for a later iteration.
choices.C: Determine whether other cross-functional team members are able to take over the work.
choices.D: Engage with stakeholders directly to review the iteration process.

questions.question_text:
An agile project has a documented list of requirements prioritized in high, medium, and low categories. The project team has expressed that it is difficult to know what to work on next as so many items are listed as high priority.

What should the project manager recommend?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The answer is B because the main job of a product owner is to Prioritize Backlogs

Selected Answer: B
B. Ensure the product owner determines the priority based on a product roadmap, release plan, and iteration plan.

B is the most appropriate solution because it keeps the prioritization responsibility with the product owner, ensuring alignment with the overall product vision and business objectives.

Selected Answer: B
B. Ensure the product owner determines the priority based on a product roadmap, release plan, and iteration plan
Product Owner has one job - Manage and Prioritize Backlog. So answer is B
